title: Nightmare Abbey - why Mrs Glowry marries

content.question: According to the passage, Mrs. Glowry married her husband in part because she

choices.label: was intrigued by Mr. Glowryâ€™s mysterious demeanor

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe how textual details reveal nuances and complexities in characters' relationships with one another.
